channel.title: Spotlight from RadioPublic.
channel.description: Listen to previews and trailers for podcasts and radio shows.

item.title: Death, Sex & Money - TODO
item.description: A podcast hosted by Anna Sale about the big questions and hard choices that are often left out of polite conversation. Email the show at deathsexmoney@wnyc.org.
item.itunes:author: WNYC (WNYC Studios)
item.itunes:keywords: wnyc, anna, sale, death, sex, money, relationships, family, storytelling, wnyc, studios
item.itunes:subtitle: Death, Sex & Money - TODO
item.itunes:summary: A podcast hosted by Anna Sale about the big questions and hard choices that are often left out of polite conversation. Email the show at deathsexmoney@wnyc.org.

item.title: Joe Rogan Experience - If you enjoyed Fear Factor, The Man Show and UFC Ultimate Insider
item.itunes:subtitle: Joe Rogan Experience - If you enjoyed Fear Factor, The Man Show and UFC Ultimate Insider

item.title: The Moth - Popular with people who love funny, sad and inspirational stories that move you.
item.description: Since its launch in 1997, The Moth has presented thousands of true stories, told live and without notes, to standing-room-only crowds worldwide. Moth storytellers stand alone, under a spotlight, with only a microphone and a roomful of strangers. The storyteller and the audience embark on a high-wire act of shared experience which is both terrifying and exhilarating. Since 2008, The Moth podcast has featured many of our favorite stories told live on Moth stages around the country. For information on all of our programs and live events, visit themoth.org.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Moth - Popular with people who love funny, sad and inspirational stories that move you.

item.title: Planet Money - If you enjoy Bloomberg TV and the movies The Big Short and Moneyball
item.description: Money makes the world go around, faster and faster every day. On NPR's Planet Money, you'll meet high rollers, brainy economists and regular folks — all trying to make sense of our rapidly changing global economy.
item.itunes:subtitle: Planet Money - If you enjoy Bloomberg TV and the movies The Big Short and Moneyball
item.itunes:summary: Money makes the world go around, faster and faster every day. On NPR's Planet Money, you'll meet high rollers, brainy economists and regular folks — all trying to make sense of our rapidly changing global economy.

item.title: Modern Love - If you enjoy Sex and the City, Broad City, Girls
item.description: Explore the joys and tribulations of love in these deeply personal essays. A collaboration of The New York Times and WBUR in Boston, Modern Love: The Podcast features the popular New York Times column, with readings by notable personalities and updates from the essayists themselves. Join host Meghna Chakrabarti (WBUR) and Modern Love editor Daniel Jones (NYT) and fall in love at first listen.
item.itunes:subtitle: Modern Love - If you enjoy Sex and the City, Broad City, Girls
item.itunes:summary: Explore the joys and tribulations of love in these deeply personal essays. A collaboration of The New York Times and WBUR in Boston, Modern Love: The Podcast features the popular New York Times column, with readings by notable personalities and updates from the essayists themselves. Join host Meghna Chakrabarti (WBUR) and Modern Love editor Daniel Jones (NYT) and fall in love at first listen.

item.title: Serial - If you enjoy Dateline NBC, 48 Hours, 20/20, 60 Minutes
item.description: Serial is a podcast from the creators of This American Life, hosted by Sarah Koenig. Serial unfolds one story - a true story - over the course of a whole season. The show follows the plot and characters wherever they lead, through many surprising twists and turns. Sarah won't know what happens at the end of the story until she gets there, not long before you get there with her. Each week she'll bring you the latest chapter, so it's important to listen in, starting with Episode 1. New episodes are released on Thursday mornings.
item.itunes:subtitle: Serial - If you enjoy Dateline NBC, 48 Hours, 20/20, 60 Minutes
item.itunes:summary: Serial is a podcast from the creators of This American Life, hosted by Sarah Koenig. Serial unfolds one story - a true story - over the course of a whole season. item.title: 99% Invisible - Popular with designers, architects, engineers and people who like the TV show How Stuff Works.
item.description: Design is everywhere in our lives, perhaps most importantly in the places where we’ve just stopped noticing. 99% Invisible (99 Percent Invisible) is a weekly exploration of the process and power of design and architecture. From award winning producer Roman Mars, KALW in San Francisco, and Radiotopia from PRX. Learn more: http://99percentinvisible.org Proud member of PRX’s Radiotopia.
item.itunes:subtitle: 99% Invisible - Popular with designers, architects, engineers and people who like the TV show How Stuff Works.
